title: 最新的es gm 插件不能更改用户组了？？
author: papwick
txt_content:
升级到1.8 给用户更改用户组 输入/manuadd id 用户组提示 “ can't modify player involving a group that you don't inherit. ”

不知道为什么

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: can't modify player involving a group that you don't inherit 不能编辑在非自己组中的玩家 大概这个意思 lz操作问题 请用谷歌翻译谢谢

replies.author: papwick
replies.txt_content: ..... 我翻译了 没升级前是可以的。。。
